name: Push-ups
instructions: Start in a high plank with hands slightly wider than shoulders
Lower chest toward the floor keeping elbows at ~45°
Push back to the starting position
Keep core braced and body in a straight line

name: Squats
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Push hips back and bend knees to lower
Descend until thighs are parallel to floor
Drive through heels to stand tall

name: Deadlifts
instructions: Set bar over mid-foot, grip just outside legs
Flatten back, brace, and drive through heels
Extend hips and knees to stand tall
Lower with control keeping bar close to body

name: Pull-ups
instructions: Hang from bar with overhand grip
Pull elbows down to bring chin above bar
Pause briefly, then lower under control
Keep ribs down and core engaged

name: Bench Press
instructions: Lie on bench, feet flat and shoulder blades retracted
Grip bar slightly wider than shoulders
Lower bar to mid-chest with forearms vertical
Press bar back up over shoulders

name: Plank
instructions: Set forearms on floor with elbows under shoulders
Extend legs, forming a straight line head to heels
Brace abs and glutes
Hold while breathing steadily

name: Lunges
instructions: Stand tall and step forward into a lunge
Lower until both knees are ~90°
Drive through front heel to stand
Alternate legs each rep

name: Mountain Climbers
instructions: Start in a high plank
Drive one knee toward chest
Switch legs quickly in a running motion
Maintain flat back and braced core

name: Dumbbell Rows
instructions: Brace one hand on bench, flat back and hips hinged
Row dumbbell toward hip, squeezing shoulder blade
Lower under control and repeat
Keep torso square to the floor

name: Shoulder Press
instructions: Sit upright with dumbbells at shoulder height
Press overhead until arms are extended
Lower to the starting position
Keep ribs down and glutes tight

name: Bicep Curls
instructions: Stand tall holding dumbbells at sides
Curl weights while keeping elbows near torso
Squeeze at the top and lower slowly
Avoid swinging the body

name: Tricep Dips
instructions: Place hands on bench behind you, legs extended
Lower body by bending elbows to ~90°
Press back up by extending elbows
Keep shoulders down and chest lifted

name: Calf Raises
instructions: Stand with balls of feet on a platform
Rise onto toes by extending ankles
Pause at top then lower slowly
Keep knees soft and controlled

name: Russian Twists
instructions: Sit with knees bent and lean back slightly
Lift feet if able and brace core
Rotate torso to tap hands beside hip
Alternate sides with control

name: Leg Raises
instructions: Lie on back with legs straight
Brace core and lift legs until vertical
Lower legs without touching the floor
Keep lower back pressed down

name: Side Plank
instructions: Lie on side and prop up on forearm
Stack feet and lift hips into a straight line
Keep shoulder over elbow and ribs down
Hold while breathing steadily

name: Hip Thrusts
instructions: Place upper back on bench, feet flat
Position barbell across hips
Drive through heels to extend hips
Squeeze glutes at top; lower under control

name: Leg Press
instructions: Set feet shoulder-width on platform
Unlock and lower until knees ~90°
Press through mid-foot to extend knees
Avoid locking knees at top

name: Crunches
instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent
Lift shoulders off floor by contracting abs
Pause briefly, then lower slowly
Avoid pulling on the neck

name: Bent Over Barbell Row
instructions: Hinge at hips with flat back, overhand grip
Row bar to lower chest/upper abs
Squeeze shoulder blades together
Lower bar under control

name: Front Raises
instructions: Hold dumbbells in front of thighs
Raise arms forward to shoulder level
Lower with control and repeat
Keep torso still; avoid swinging

name: Side Lateral Raises
instructions: Hold dumbbells at sides, palms facing in
Lift arms out to sides until parallel
Lower slowly; keep shoulders down
Maintain slight elbow bend

name: Chest Flyes
instructions: Lie on bench with dumbbells over chest
Lower arms in a wide arc with slight elbow bend
Bring weights back together over chest
Keep shoulders packed and motion controlled

name: Hammer Curls
instructions: Hold dumbbells with palms facing each other
Curl while keeping elbows at sides
Squeeze at top and lower slowly
Avoid leaning back or swinging

name: Overhead Tricep Extension
instructions: Hold one dumbbell overhead with both hands
Bend elbows to lower weight behind head
Extend elbows to press weight up
Keep upper arms vertical and ribs down

name: Seated Cable Row
instructions: Sit with feet on platform and neutral spine
Pull handle toward lower ribs, squeezing shoulder blades
Pause, then extend arms under control
Avoid shrugging or leaning back excessively

name: Romanian Deadlift (RDL)
instructions: Stand tall holding bar at hips, soft knees
Hinge by pushing hips back, keeping bar close to legs
Lower until hamstrings are stretched, spine neutral
Drive hips forward to stand tall

name: Side Bridge
instructions: Lie on side and prop up on forearm
Lift hips to form a straight line
Keep neck neutral and core braced
Hold for time with steady breathing

name: Glute Bridge
instructions: Lie on back with knees bent and feet flat
Brace core and drive through heels
Lift hips until knees, hips, and shoulders align
Lower with control and repeat

name: Arnold Press
instructions: Start with dumbbells at upper chest, palms facing you
Rotate palms away while pressing overhead
Reverse the motion to return
Keep core tight and back neutral

name: Wide-Grip Lat Pulldown
instructions: Grip bar wide and sit tall with slight lean back
Pull bar to upper chest by driving elbows down
Pause, then control the ascent
Avoid shrugging and swinging

name: Cable Crossover
instructions: Set pulleys high and step forward with slight lean
With elbows soft, bring handles together in front
Squeeze chest, then return with control
Keep ribs down and shoulders packed

name: Jumping Jacks
instructions: Start standing with feet together and arms at sides
Jump feet apart while raising arms overhead
Jump feet back together lowering arms
Maintain rhythm and soft landings

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
instructions: Set bench to 30–45° incline and lie back with dumbbells at chest
Press up over shoulders; keep wrists neutral
Lower to ~90° elbow angle with scapula retracted
Press back up with a slight inward arc

name: Decline Push-up
instructions: Place feet on a bench and hands slightly wider than shoulders
Lower chest toward floor with elbows at ~45°
Keep core tight and body straight
Press back to start without flaring elbows

name: Pike Push-up
instructions: Start in a pike with hips high and spine neutral
Bend elbows to lower head toward floor
Maintain 45° elbow path and braced core
Press back to the pike position

name: Diamond Push-up
instructions: Form a diamond with thumbs and index fingers under chest
Lower torso keeping elbows close to body
Stop before shoulders roll forward
Press up while keeping core tight

name: Chest Dip
instructions: Grip parallel bars and support bodyweight
Lean torso slightly forward and bend knees behind
Lower until shoulders are just below elbows
Press through palms, keeping forward lean

name: Face Pull
instructions: Set cable at upper-chest height with rope
Pull toward face with elbows high, thumbs back
Externally rotate at end range
Return slowly without shrugging

name: Rear Delt Fly
instructions: Hinge at hips, dumbbells under shoulders
Raise arms out to sides with slight elbow bend
Squeeze shoulder blades at top
Lower slowly without rounding back

name: T-Bar Row
instructions: Set torso support and grip handles
Row handle toward sternum while keeping chest down
Pause and squeeze shoulder blades
Lower with control without bouncing

name: Chin-up
instructions: Hang from bar with supinated grip
Pull elbows down/back until chin clears bar
Pause and lower under control
Avoid kipping or shrugging

name: Close-Grip Bench Press
instructions: Grip bar just inside shoulder width
Lower to lower chest keeping elbows tucked
Press up tracking bar over shoulders
Keep shoulder blades retracted

name: Skullcrusher (Lying Triceps Extension)
instructions: Lie on bench and press EZ-bar over chest
Hinge at elbows to lower bar toward forehead
Keep upper arms vertical and elbows tucked
Extend elbows to return

name: Cable Triceps Pushdown
instructions: Set cable high and grasp attachment
Pin elbows to sides and extend arms down
Squeeze triceps at full extension
Return under control without elbow drift

name: Preacher Curl
instructions: Set upper arms on preacher pad with full elbow extension
Curl bar toward shoulders without lifting triceps off pad
Pause and squeeze at top
Lower slowly to full stretch

name: Concentration Curl
instructions: Sit, brace upper arm against inner thigh
Curl dumbbell to shoulder keeping torso still
Squeeze at top and lower slowly
Repeat then switch arms

name: EZ-Bar Curl
instructions: Stand tall holding EZ-bar with underhand grip
Curl bar while keeping elbows fixed
Avoid swinging or leaning back
Lower slowly to full extension

name: Reverse Curl
instructions: Grip bar with pronated grip
Curl bar keeping wrists neutral
Squeeze at top without elbows flaring
Lower slowly with control

name: Wrist Curl
instructions: Sit and rest forearms on thighs/pad with palms up
Allow bar to roll to fingertips
Curl wrists to raise bar and squeeze
Lower slowly maintaining control

name: Cable Hip Abduction
instructions: Attach ankle cuff to low cable and stand tall
Sweep leg outward in a controlled arc
Pause and squeeze side glutes
Return slowly without rotating hips

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
instructions: Place back foot on bench behind, front foot forward
Descend until back knee nears floor
Keep front knee tracking over toes
Drive through front heel to stand

name: Step-up
instructions: Place whole foot on box/bench
Drive through heel to stand tall on platform
Control the descent back to floor
Alternate legs or complete reps per side

name: Goblet Squat
instructions: Hold kettlebell at chest with elbows down
Sit hips down between heels while keeping chest tall
Keep knees tracking over toes
Drive through mid-foot to stand

name: Front Squat
instructions: Rack bar on front delts with clean or cross grip
Keep elbows high and chest up
Sit down between heels maintaining upright torso
Drive up through mid-foot to stand

name: Dumbbell Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Hold dumbbells at thighs, soft knees
Push hips back and keep spine neutral
Lower until hamstrings stretch while weights track thighs
Drive hips forward to stand

name: Kettlebell Swing
instructions: Hike bell back between legs with neutral spine
Explosively extend hips to project bell forward
Let bell float to chest height with arms relaxed
Hinge again as bell returns; do not squat

name: Sumo Deadlift
instructions: Set feet wide with toes out, grip inside knees
Brace and drive floor apart with feet
Stand tall keeping bar close
Lower with control maintaining knee tracking

name: Lying Leg Curl
instructions: Lie prone and align knees with machine axis
Curl pad toward glutes without lifting hips
Squeeze at top then lower slowly
Avoid hyperextending lower back

name: Nordic Hamstring Curl
instructions: Anchor heels and kneel upright
Lower torso forward slowly resisting with hamstrings
Catch with hands at bottom if needed
Push up lightly and pull with hamstrings to return

name: Copenhagen Plank
instructions: Place top leg on bench, bottom leg hanging below
Support on forearm with shoulders stacked
Lift hips and hold a straight line
Keep pelvis level and breathe

name: Hanging Knee Raise
instructions: Hang from bar with active shoulders
Tuck pelvis and raise knees to hip height or higher
Control the descent without swinging
Avoid arching or shrugging

name: Bicycle Crunch
instructions: Lie on back with hands lightly at temples
Bring one knee toward chest while rotating torso
Reach opposite elbow toward knee without pulling neck
Alternate sides in a controlled cadence

name: Pallof Press
instructions: Stand perpendicular to cable with handle at chest
Press handle straight out resisting rotation
Hold briefly then return to chest
Maintain square hips and shoulders

name: Ab Wheel Rollout
instructions: Kneel with wheel under shoulders and brace core
Roll forward keeping hips from sagging
Stop before losing lumbar neutrality
Pull back to start using lats and abs

name: Farmer's Carry
instructions: Stand tall holding heavy weights at sides
Brace core, pack shoulders, and walk controlled steps
Maintain neutral spine and steady breathing
Turn safely; avoid banging weights on legs

name: Overhead Carry
instructions: Press weights overhead and lock elbows
Pack shoulders and keep ribs down
Walk slow, controlled steps
Lower safely to finish

name: Turkish Get-Up
instructions: From supine, press bell and post to elbow then hand
Bridge hips, sweep leg, and half-kneel
Stand up while keeping eyes on bell
Reverse steps to return to floor

name: Battle Rope Waves
instructions: Stand athletic with slight knee bend and neutral spine
Move arms alternately to create waves
Keep waves continuous without shrugging
Breathe rhythmically and maintain posture

name: Box Jump
instructions: Stand an arm’s length from box and load hips back
Swing arms and jump, landing softly with knees tracking
Stand tall on box then step down under control
Reset between reps to maintain quality

name: Weighted Pull-Up
instructions: Attach weight belt or hold a dumbbell between feet
Hang from bar with desired grip
Pull chin above bar keeping core tight
Lower slowly under control

name: Weighted Push-Up
instructions: Place weight plate or wear vest on back
Perform push-ups with elbows at 45°
Keep body straight and core braced
Lower and press up under control

name: Landmine Press
instructions: Place one end of barbell in landmine or corner
Hold free end with both hands or one hand
Press bar upward in an arc
Lower under control keeping core tight

name: Zercher Squat
instructions: Place barbell in crooks of elbows with arms wrapped
Stand with feet shoulder-width
Sit hips down keeping chest upright
Drive through feet to stand

name: Overhead Squat
instructions: Press bar overhead with wide grip
Sit hips down between heels maintaining bar over mid-foot
Keep chest up and arms locked
Stand up while maintaining overhead position

name: Cable Hammer Curl
instructions: Attach rope handle to low pulley
Hold rope with palms facing each other
Curl upward while keeping elbows pinned
Lower slowly back to start

name: Barbell Shrug
instructions: Hold barbell at thighs with overhand grip
Elevate shoulders upward toward ears
Pause at top then lower slowly
Avoid rolling shoulders

name: Dumbbell Shrug
instructions: Hold dumbbells at sides
Elevate shoulders straight up
Hold briefly then lower
Avoid swinging or rolling

name: Barbell Curl
instructions: Hold bar with shoulder-width underhand grip
Curl bar upward keeping elbows close
Squeeze at top, then lower slowly
Avoid using momentum or leaning back

name: Weighted Step-Up
instructions: Place foot on box, weight held across back or at sides
Drive through heel to step up
Pause then step down under control
Alternate legs or complete one side at a time

name: Seated Calf Raise
instructions: Sit with knees under pads and balls of feet on platform
Push through toes to raise heels
Pause at top then lower slowly
Keep motion controlled without bouncing

name: Weighted Sit-Up
instructions: Lie on back with knees bent and plate held at chest
Sit up by curling torso toward knees
Return under control without letting plate drop
Keep feet anchored or use partner if needed

name: Weighted Russian Twist
instructions: Sit with knees bent and hold plate with both hands
Lean back slightly and lift feet off floor
Rotate torso to move plate side to side
Control the motion and maintain balance

name: Medicine Ball Slam
instructions: Lift medicine ball overhead with arms extended
Forcefully slam ball down to the ground
Catch or retrieve and reset quickly
Repeat continuously with good posture

name: Jump Rope
instructions: Hold rope handles at sides and swing rope overhead
Jump when rope nears feet
Land softly on balls of feet
Maintain rhythm and adjust speed as needed

name: High Knees
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart
Run in place lifting knees to hip height
Move arms naturally to assist
Keep core engaged and land softly

name: Side Lunge
instructions: Stand with feet together
Step out to one side and bend that knee
Keep opposite leg straight and hips back
Push off to return and repeat other side

name: Box Squat
instructions: Set a box or bench behind you
With barbell on back, sit back until glutes touch box
Keep shins vertical and chest up
Drive through feet to stand without rocking

name: Weighted Dip
instructions: Attach weight belt or hold dumbbell between feet
Perform dips keeping elbows tucked
Lower until arms are at 90°
Press back to start, maintaining good form

name: Rowing Machine
instructions: Strap feet in and grab handle
Drive with legs, lean back slightly, then pull with arms
Reverse the motion: arms, hinge, then legs
Maintain smooth rhythm and controlled breathing

name: Treadmill Run
instructions: Set treadmill to desired speed and incline
Run with midfoot strike and relaxed arms
Keep posture upright and core engaged
Maintain consistent breathing throughout

name: Stationary Bike
instructions: Adjust seat height and resistance
Pedal smoothly with full range of motion
Maintain steady cadence and posture
Adjust resistance and speed as needed

name: Stair Climber
instructions: Step onto machine and grip handles lightly
Climb stairs at a consistent pace
Keep posture upright and core engaged
Adjust speed and resistance to suit fitness level

name: Bear Crawl
instructions: Start on hands and feet with hips low
Move opposite hand and foot forward
Keep back flat and core engaged
Continue crawling for distance or time

name: Wall Sit
instructions: Lean back against wall and slide down until knees are 90°
Keep feet shoulder-width and knees over ankles
Hold position with core engaged
Breathe steadily and maintain posture

name: Clamshell
instructions: Lie on side with knees bent and feet together
Keep hips stacked and lift top knee open
Pause at top then lower
Maintain feet together and don't rotate torso

name: Fire Hydrant
instructions: Start on hands and knees with neutral spine
Lift one knee out to the side keeping knee bent
Pause at top then lower
Repeat on other leg with controlled motion

name: Donkey Kick
instructions: Start on hands and knees
Flex foot and lift heel toward ceiling keeping knee bent
Squeeze glute at top then lower
Avoid arching back during the movement

name: Bird Dog
instructions: Start on hands and knees with neutral spine
Extend one arm and opposite leg simultaneously
Hold briefly then return and switch sides
Keep hips and shoulders level throughout

name: Superman
instructions: Lie prone with arms extended overhead
Simultaneously lift arms, chest, and legs off the floor
Hold briefly then lower
Keep gaze neutral and squeeze glutes

name: Reverse Crunch
instructions: Lie on back with knees bent and feet off floor
Use abs to curl hips off floor, drawing knees toward chest
Lower slowly without letting feet touch ground
Keep movement controlled and avoid using momentum

name: Bicycle Kick
instructions: Lie on back with hands at temples
Alternate bringing opposite elbow to knee while extending other leg
Maintain a steady, controlled pace
Keep lower back pressed into floor

name: Plank with Shoulder Tap
instructions: Start in high plank with hands under shoulders
Lift one hand to tap opposite shoulder
Alternate sides while keeping hips stable
Engage core to prevent rotation

name: Sprawl
instructions: From standing, drop hands to floor and kick legs back into plank
Immediately jump legs back in and stand up
Repeat quickly for continuous reps
Keep core tight throughout

name: YTWL
instructions: Hinge at hips with light dumbbells
Raise arms overhead forming a Y
Lower and raise arms to form T, W, and L positions sequentially
Perform each letter slowly with control

name: Heel Touch
instructions: Lie on back with knees bent and feet flat
Crunch up slightly and reach right hand toward right heel
Return to center and reach left hand to left heel
Alternate sides with controlled movement

name: Lateral Band Walk
instructions: Place band above knees or around ankles
Assume athletic stance and take small steps sideways
Keep tension on band and hips level
Step for desired distance then switch directions

name: Monster Walk
instructions: Place band around legs above knees
Take diagonal steps forward and outward
Maintain slight squat and tension on band
Repeat backward or forward for distance

name: Sled Push
instructions: Lean into sled with arms extended
Drive through legs to push sled forward
Maintain low body position and tight core
Control speed and distance of push

name: Sled Pull
instructions: Attach straps to sled and hold handles
Walk backward pulling sled, leaning slightly forward
Keep knees bent and drive through heels
Maintain steady pace and engage core
